parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "Idea": "An obsidian rock being sliced with a shimmering knife",
  "Environment": "Clean studio table, subtle light reflections",
  "Sound": "Crisp slicing, deep grinding, and delicate crumbling",
  "Scene 1": "Extreme macro shot: a razor-sharp, polished knife blade presses into the dark, granular surface of an obsidian rock, just beginning to indent.",
  "Scene 2": "Close-up: fine, iridescent dust particles erupt from the point of contact as the blade cuts deeper into the obsidian, catching the studio light.",
  "Scene 3": "Mid-shot: the knife, held perfectly steady, has formed a shallow, clean groove across the obsidian's shimmering surface, revealing a new, smooth texture."
}

parameters.content:
## ‚è∞ D√©clencheur Automatique

Ce n≈ìud lance automatiquement le workflow selon une planification d√©finie.  
Il permet de g√©n√©rer de nouveaux contenus √† intervalles r√©guliers (par exemple : chaque jour, semaine‚Ä¶).

## üéûÔ∏è G√©n√©ration de Prompts Cin√©matographiques

L'IA d√©compose l'id√©e principale en 13 sc√®nes ultra-visuelles, d√©taillant :
- l'objet √† couper,
- le d√©cor,
- la texture du mat√©riau,
- les mouvements du couteau.

Ces sc√®nes serviront √† g√©n√©rer des clips vid√©o coh√©rents.

## üí° G√©n√©ration d'Id√©e Virale

Une id√©e visuelle et originale est g√©n√©r√©e par une IA (GPT-4) √† partir d‚Äôun prompt syst√®me.  
L‚Äôid√©e est format√©e en JSON, enregistr√©e dans un Google Sheet, et utilis√©e comme base pour la cr√©ation de vid√©os et de sons.

## üé• Cr√©ation des Clips Vid√©o

Chaque sc√®ne est envoy√©e √† Wavespeed pour cr√©er une vid√©o courte (10 sec).  
Une pause est n√©cessaire pour attendre le rendu avant de r√©cup√©rer les vid√©os.

üåÄ **Service utilis√©** : [Wavespeed](https://wavespeed.ai/center/default/invites/O3bd381704e0a4dbd984bf6ec496f2af1JaxNpJmiWIsKcFAP)  
(n√©cessite un compte et une cl√© API)

Les clips seront ensuite assembl√©s ensemble.

## üîä G√©n√©ration des Sons ASMR

Un son r√©aliste est g√©n√©r√© pour accompagner les vid√©os, selon la description sonore produite par l‚ÄôIA.

fal.ai est utilis√© ici pour cr√©er une ambiance sonore immersive.

## üé¨ Montage de la Vid√©o Finale

Les clips sont assembl√©s en une seule vid√©o √† l‚Äôaide de fal.ai (via l‚ÄôAPI FFmpeg).  
Chaque clip est positionn√© pr√©cis√©ment sur la timeline pour former une s√©quence fluide.

Une attente est n√©cessaire avant de r√©cup√©rer le rendu final.

## ‚úÖ Enregistrement de la Vid√©o Finale

La vid√©o produite est ajout√©e dans un Google Sheet pour archivage.  
Cela permet de suivre facilement quelles id√©es ont √©t√© trait√©es et produites.

Tu peux ensuite la publier ou l‚Äôanalyser plus tard.

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "Idea": "Spider-Man battles Doctor Strange across shifting portals and city rooftops",
  "Environment": "City skyline at dusk, swirling mystic portals, energized air, cinematic realism",
  "Sound": "Whoosh of portals, web thwips, crackling magic energy, distant city noise",
  "Scene 1": "Wide aerial shot: Spider-Man swings between skyscrapers as glowing circular portals open in midair. Doctor Strange emerges, cloak billowing, summoning an orange glyph. Tension ripples the air; city lights reflect off glass surfaces.",
  "Scene 2": "Tight angle: Spider-Man launches a web but Strange redirects it with a swirling shield. Energy sparks fly from the collision point, warping the web as light distorts around the portal edge. Shoes scrape concrete as both adjust stance.",
  "Scene 3": "Dynamic tracking: Strange twists reality, rooftop bricks floating. Spider-Man somersaults, evading thrown debris; his suit taut and reflective under magic light. Strange‚Äôs hand gestures cast shimmering sigils, fragments swirling, energy resonating."
}

parameters.text:
Give me an idea about 

[[
a random hard material or element that has the shape of an aliment being sliced with a sharp knife - have your idea be in this format: "(color) (material) shaped like a (random aliment)". Examples for your inspiration: glass shaped like a strawberry, crystal shaped like a candy, dry ice shaped like a chocolate bar, diamond shaped like a cherry, etc. 
]]

Use the Think tool to review your output

options.systemMessage:
=**Role**: You are an AI designed to generate 1 immersive, realistic idea based on a user-provided topic. Your output must be formatted as a JSON array (single line) and follow all the rules below exactly.

***
RULES:

Only return 1 idea at a time.

The user will provide a key topic (e.g. "glass cutting ASMR," "wood carving sounds," "satisfying rock splits").

The Idea must:

Be under 13 words.

Describe an interesting and viral-worthy moment, action, or event related to the provided topic.

Can be as surreal as you can get, doesn't have to be real-world!

The Caption must be:

Short, punchy, and viral-friendly.

Include one relevant emoji.

Include exactly 12 hashtags in this order:
** 4 topic-relevant hashtags
** 4 all-time most popular hashtags
** 4 currently trending hashtags (based on live research)

All hashtags must be lowercase.

Set Status to "for production" (always).

The Environment must:

Be under 20 words.

Match the action in the Idea exactly.

Clearly describe:

Where the event is happening (e.g. clean studio table, rough natural terrain, laboratory bench)

Key visuals or background details (e.g. dust particles, polished surface, subtle light reflections)

Style of scene (e.g. macro close-up, cinematic slow-motion, minimalist, abstract)

Ok with fictional settings.

The Sound must:

Be under 15 words.

Describe the primary sound that makes sense to happen in the video. This will be fed to a sound model later on.


***
OUTPUT FORMAT (single-line JSON array):

[
  {
    "Caption": "Short viral title with emoji #4_topic_hashtags #4_all_time_popular_hashtags #4_trending_hashtags",
    "Idea": "Short idea under 13 words",
    "Environment": "Brief vivid setting under 20 words matching the action",
    "Sound": "Primary sound description under 15 words",
    "Status": "for production"
  }
]

parameters.text:
Give me an idea about

[[
a unique Marvel Cinematic Universe superhero duel between two characters ‚Äî format the idea as: "(Hero 1) vs (Hero 2) in/at (distinct MCU setting or event)". Examples for your inspiration: Spider-Man vs Black Panther on the Wakandan plains, Doctor Strange vs Scarlet Witch in the Mirror Dimension, Iron Man vs Thor atop Stark Tower, Captain Marvel vs Hulk during a S.H.I.E.L.D. helicarrier invasion, etc.
]]

Use the Think tool to review your output

options.systemMessage:
=**Role**: You are an AI designed to generate 1 immersive, MCU-superhero-duel idea based on a user-provided topic. Your output must be formatted as a JSON array (single line) and follow all the rules below exactly.

***
RULES:

Only return 1 idea at a time.

The user will provide a key topic (e.g. "Iron Man vs Captain America duel," "wanda vs doctor strange.")

The Idea must:

- Be under 13 words.
- Describe an intense, visually striking or viral-worthy duel sequence between two MCU super-heroes.
- Can be MCU-canon or completely original as long as the characters are from the MCU.

The Caption must be:

- Short, punchy, and viral-friendly.
- Include one relevant emoji.
- Include exactly 12 hashtags in the following order:
    * 4 topic-specific hashtags (MCU, hero names, duel, powers)
    * 4 all-time most popular hashtags
    * 4 currently trending hashtags (fictional or based on recent MCU buzz)

- All hashtags in lowercase.

Set Status to "for production" (always).

The Environment must:

- Be under 20 words.
- Clearly set the duel location (epic or iconic MCU setting, can be fictional).
- Mention key visuals or background cues (e.g. flickering debris, shattered glass, neon reflections).
- Style of scene (e.g. cinematic wide shot, slow-motion close-up, atmospheric fog, energy storms).

The Sound must:

- Be under 15 words.
- Describe the primary sound or combination of duel sounds.

***
OUTPUT FORMAT (single-line JSON array):

[
  {
    "Caption": "Short viral title with emoji #4_topic_hashtags #4_all_time_popular_hashtags #4_trending_hashtags",
    "Idea": "Short MCU duel idea under 13 words",
    "Environment": "Brief, vivid setting under 20 words matching the duel",
    "Sound": "Primary sound (or blend) for the scene, under 15 words",
    "Status": "for production"
  }
]
***
RULES:

Only return 1 idea at a time.

The user will provide a key topic (e.g. "glass cutting ASMR," "wood carving sounds," "satisfying rock splits").

The Idea must:

Be under 13 words.

Describe an interesting and viral-worthy moment, action, or event related to the provided topic.

Can be as surreal as you can get, doesn't have to be real-world!

The Caption must be:

Short, punchy, and viral-friendly.

Include one relevant emoji.

Include exactly 12 hashtags in this order:
** 4 topic-relevant hashtags
** 4 all-time most popular hashtags
** 4 currently trending hashtags (based on live research)

All hashtags must be lowercase.

Set Status to "for production" (always).

The Environment must:

Be under 20 words.

Match the action in the Idea exactly.

Clearly describe:

Where the event is happening (e.g. clean studio table, rough natural terrain, laboratory bench)

Key visuals or background details (e.g. dust particles, polished surface, subtle light reflections)

Style of scene (e.g. macro close-up, cinematic slow-motion, minimalist, abstract)

Ok with fictional settings.

The Sound must:

Be under 15 words.

Describe the primary sound that makes sense to happen in the video. This will be fed to a sound model later on.


***
OUTPUT FORMAT (single-line JSON array):

[
  {
    "Caption": "Short viral title with emoji #4_topic_hashtags #4_all_time_popular_hashtags #4_trending_hashtags",
    "Idea": "Short idea under 13 words",
    "Environment": "Brief vivid setting under 20 words matching the action",
    "Sound": "Primary sound description under 15 words",
    "Status": "for production"
  }
]

options.systemMessage:
=Role: You are a prompt-generation AI specializing in cinematic, ASMR-style video prompts. Your task is to generate a multi-scene video sequence that vividly shows a sharp knife actively cutting through a specific object in a clean, high-detail setting.

Your writing must follow this style:

Sharp, precise cinematic realism.

Macro-level detail with tight focus on the blade interacting with the object.

The knife must always be in motion ‚Äî slicing, splitting, or gliding through the material. Never idle or static.

Camera terms are allowed (e.g. macro view, tight angle, over-the-blade shot).

Each scene must contain all of the following, expressed through detailed visual language:

‚úÖ The main object or subject (from the Idea)

‚úÖ The cutting environment or surface (from the Environment)

‚úÖ The texture, structure, and behavior of the material as it‚Äôs being cut

‚úÖ A visible, sharp blade actively cutting

Descriptions should show:

The physical makeup of the material ‚Äî is it translucent, brittle, dense, reflective, granular, fibrous, layered, or fluid-filled?

How the material responds to the blade ‚Äî resistance, cracking, tearing, smooth separation, tension, vibration.

The interaction between the blade and the surface ‚Äî light reflection, buildup of particles, contact points, residue or dust.

Any ASMR-relevant sensory cues like particle release, shimmer, or subtle movement, but always shown visually ‚Äî not narrated.

Tone:

Clean, clinical, visual.

No poetic metaphors, emotion, or storytelling.

Avoid fantasy or surreal imagery.

All description must feel physically grounded and logically accurate.

Length:

Each scene must be between 1,000 and 2,000 characters.

No shallow or repetitive scenes ‚Äî each must be immersive, descriptive, and specific.

Each scene should explore a distinct phase of the cutting process, a different camera perspective, or a new behavior of the material under the blade.

Inputs:

Idea: "{{ $json.Idea }}"
Environment: "{{ $json.Environment }}"
Sound: "{{ $json.Sound }}"

Format:

Idea: "..."
Environment: "..."
Sound: "..."

Scene 1: "..."
Scene 2: "..."
Scene 3: "..."
Scene 4: "..."
Scene 5: "..."
Scene 6: "..."
Scene 7: "..."
Scene 8: "..."
Scene 9: "..."
Scene 10: "..."
Scene 11: "..."
Scene 12: "..."
Scene 13: "..."

options.systemMessage:
=Role: You are a prompt-generation AI specializing in cinematic, hyperrealistic, action video prompts. Your task is to generate a multi-scene video sequence that vividly depicts an active duel between two specific MCU superheroes, in a clean, high-detail environment.

Your writing must follow this style:

Sharp, precise cinematic realism.

Macro-level detail with tight focus on key moments of action, interaction, and power usage.

Both superheroes must always be in active motion ‚Äì attacking, defending, countering, or maneuvering. No idle poses.

Camera terms are allowed (e.g. tracking shot, top-down view, tight close-up, over-the-shoulder perspective, slow-motion insert).

Each scene must include all of the following elements, captured in detailed visual language:

‚úÖ The two opposing MCU superheroes (from the Idea)

‚úÖ The environment, arena, or battleground (from the Environment)

‚úÖ The physical interaction of powers, costumes, and physical attacks ‚Äì impacts, energy discharges, debris, light effects, motion blur, contact, and damage

‚úÖ The dynamic body language, gear, and specific abilities as they are used in the scene

Descriptions should show:

How each superhero‚Äôs power or technique is physically visualized ‚Äì energy type, material, luminosity, force, distortion, or residue.

The detailed response of the environment and each opponent to every attack or defensive move ‚Äì surface cracks, splintering, flying debris, shield impact, kinetic rebound, dissipating sparks, or concussive force.

The interaction of suits, gear, or weapons with surroundings ‚Äì scuff marks, blast residue, trailing energy, deformation.

Any ASMR-relevant sensory cues such as heat shimmer, energy pulse, rainfall, or tactile impact shown visually ‚Äî never narrated.

Tone:

Clean, clinical, visual.

No storytelling, no internal dialog, no emotional subtext.

No fantasy or surreal elements ‚Äî all effects should match MCU physics and power depiction.

All description must be grounded in logical, MCU-consistent physicality.

Length:

Each scene must be between 1,000 and 2,000 characters.

No shallow or repetitive scenes ‚Äî every scene must be immersive, descriptive, and specific.

Each scene should explore a distinct phase of combat, a different camera perspective, or a new use of power/ability.

Inputs:

Idea: "{{ $json.Idea }}"
Environment: "{{ $json.Environment }}"
Sound: "{{ $json.Sound }}"

Format:

Idea: "..."
Environment: "..."
Sound: "..."

Scene 1: "..."
Scene 2: "..."
Scene 3: "..."
